title: rustc ICE when linking, due to exhausting the entropy pool required to create a tempdir

labels.name: A-linkage
labels.description: Area: linking into static, shared libraries and binaries

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
```
thread 'main' panicked at 'could not initialize thread_rng: All entropy sources failed (permanently unavailable); cause: OS RNG not yet seeded (not ready yet); cause: Resource temporarily unavailable (os error 11)', /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/rand-0.5.4/src/rngs/thread.rs:84:17
   Compiling cc v1.0.23

note: rustc 1.30.0-nightly (6e0f1cc15 2018-09-05) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
```
